text:
This question is related to the presence in "Edit" menu of one or another editor (kupu,bxe, tiny,...).

Who decide witch editor for witch resource ?
1) The resource
2) The editor
3) The user 

Actually 2.0.3 it's the resource that decide (see xhtml here : https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/lenya/tags/RELEASE_2_0_3/src/modules/xhtml/config/menu.xml)

And not the editor : tinymce config don't have any effect (see : https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/lenya/tags/RELEASE_2_0_3/src/modules/tinymce/config/menu.xml)

The best could be that the user can define editor - ressource association in a separate (publication specific ?) file ; but don't seems to be possible for now. 

So, the fact that the resource decide witch editor can edit him is ok or a bug ? 

If it's ok, we have to remove the module.xml in tinymce (https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/lenya/tags/RELEASE_2_0_3/src/modules/tinymce/config/menu.xml).

Any input welcome.
